name: Bubble Casino
description:
With colleagues we made a mini gamejam in a few hours. We wanted to take the idea of the old Peggles in a casino version.

With luck you may be able to pass each level with just one bullet.

Raphaël Stella - Programmer

Thibaut Chergui - Fx designer

Louis Remy - Game Art

Naomi G - Game Art

Martin D - Game Designer
